title: May 1987, from "Lilacs and Smoke"
marks: Signature, Title, Date, Edition and Chop lower margin in pencil: [Nicolas Africano 1990]; a
description: from a suite of 13 color lithographs housed in a beige linen portfolio box, titled by hand individually by the artist, with an acrylic sumi ink wash; man wearing baggy pants and hat with round brim facing left; foliage in PL hand; cigarette in PR hand
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
